jobFunction: Information Technology, Finance, and Human Resources
description: The Business Analyst, Corporate Systems role is responsible for supporting the evolving needs of the Company’s Finance & HR organizations. In this role you will provide day to day support, as well as be a key partner in providing recommendations for automation and implementing process improvement opportunities.
responsibilities:
Work with Finance, HR and cross functional teams to understand business requirements and drive them to successful completion
Provide day to day applications support to Finance, HR and other teams as needed 
Serves as the primary point of contact with vendors as it relates to the support day to day business functions as well as current projects
Plan, prioritize and manage enhancements/projects on roadmap ensuring successful end user experience
Work with technical teams to translate requirements and deliver system solutions covering all facets of testing
Configure systems based on business requirements and design and develop custom reports for finance and HR users as required
Build influential working relationships with business users for successful partnerships

qualifications.required:
Minimum 5 years of experience as a business analyst in IT
At least 3 years of experience implementing, enhancing, supporting and/or upgrading ERP systems such as NetSuite, Dynamics 365 or Great Plains
Ability to understand business processes and its relationship to integration points and its interdependencies
Working knowledge of Software Development and Project Life Cycles to help support projects through its various phases
Organized, motivated functional analyst with ability to take ownership of projects, manage deadlines, and drive to completion
Naturally curious, Fast learner, detail oriented, strong analysis and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication skills (in person, phone and email)
Understanding of Finance and Accounting processes is highly preferred
Working experience of Sales Audit (Aptos) or a similar Financial System is strongly preferred
Retail/Apparel experience preferred
SQL experience is preferred
Working experience in a HR System is a plus
qualifications.preferred: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Accounting, Finance or related field or equivalent experience
